planCardDescription: Manage your personal account billing details.

setup.title: Set Up Your AI Receptionist
setup.subtitle: Configure your AI-powered phone receptionist in a few simple steps

voice.title: Step 1: Voice Selection
voice.description: Choose the voice personality for your AI receptionist

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Upload documents to train your AI receptionist
knowledge.cardDescription: Upload documents about your services, hours, policies, and FAQs
knowledge.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click to upload
knowledge.supportedFormats: Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT files up to 10MB each
knowledge.voiceNotFound: Voice selection not found. Please go back to step 1.
knowledge.manageDescription: Upload documents to train your AI receptionist. Changes are synced immediately after saving.
knowledge.howItWorks: Your AI receptionist learns from the documents you upload here. The more relevant information you provide, the more accurate and helpful it will be when answering caller questions. Changes take effect immediately after saving.
knowledge.fileFormats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT up to 10MB
knowledge.kbUpdated: Knowledge base updated — {{count}} file(s) synced to AI agent

categories.clinicInfoDesc: Business hours, location, directions, parking, contact details
categories.clinicInfoExamples: Hours of operation • Address & directions • Parking info • Phone & email
categories.servicesExamples: Service menu & pricing • Treatment descriptions • Special offers
categories.insuranceDesc: Accepted plans, coverage policies, billing FAQs
categories.insuranceExamples: Accepted insurance list • Coverage policies • Billing procedures
categories.providersExamples: Doctor bios & photos • Specialties & certifications • Availability schedules
categories.policiesDesc: Cancellation rules, new patient requirements, payment terms
categories.policiesExamples: Cancellation & no-show policy • New patient forms • Payment terms
categories.faqsExamples: Common questions • Pre-visit preparation • Post-procedure care

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect your practice management system for automated appointment booking
integrations.pmsDescription: Connect your PMS to enable automatic appointment booking, patient lookups, and more
integrations.pmsIntegrationDesc: Connect your existing PMS for seamless appointment booking, patient management, and billing
integrations.pmsAlertRecommended: Recommended: PMS integration provides full patient management, billing, and insurance verification. You can always connect it later if not ready now.
integrations.otherIntegrationsDesc: Additional calendar and scheduling integrations will be available soon
integrations.calendlyDesc: Sync appointments with your Calendly account
integrations.calendarDescConnected: Optional: Add calendar sync for additional backup
integrations.calendarDescNotConnected: Alternative option if you don't have a PMS system
integrations.googleCalendarBasicSync: Sync appointments to your personal calendar
integrations.googleCalendarBasicManagement: Basic appointment management using your Google Calendar
integrations.googleCalendarNote: Note: Google Calendar provides basic appointment scheduling. For full features (patient records, billing, insurance), connect a PMS instead.
integrations.alertOptional: This integration is optional but highly recommended. Your AI receptionist will be able to book appointments, look up patient information, and handle scheduling automatically when connected.

alerts.optionalDesc: You can set up your PMS integration now or skip and set it up later from settings.
alerts.connectedDesc: Your practice management system is connected and ready to sync appointments.

benefits.title: Why Connect Your PMS?
benefits.autoSchedulingDesc: Appointments are added directly to your calendar
benefits.realTimeAvailDesc: AI knows your schedule and books accordingly

phone.title: Phone Integration
phone.description: Connect your phone number to your AI receptionist
phone.chooseMethodDesc: Select how you want to connect your phone number
phone.setupMethod: Complete the setup for your selected method
phone.selectMethod: Please select a phone integration method

sip.name: SIP Trunk
sip.description: Connect your existing PBX system via SIP

forwarded.name: Call Forwarding
forwarded.description: Forward calls from your existing number to our system
pros: Keep full control of your number
forwarded.bestFor: Most clinics — fast setup with full caller ID

ported.name: Port Number
ported.description: Transfer your existing phone number to our system

forwarding.headerDesc: The fastest way to get started. Keep your existing number and forward calls to Parlae when you want AI to answer. Patient caller ID is preserved for automatic lookups.
forwarding.clinicNumberHint: The number patients currently call. You will set up forwarding from this number after deployment.
forwarding.forwardAllDesc: Every incoming call goes to the AI receptionist. You'll provide a dedicated human line for emergencies and transfer requests.
forwarding.noAnswerDesc: Staff answers during office hours. AI picks up when nobody answers or lines are busy. Good for gradual adoption.
forwarding.humanLineDescAll: A direct number where a human can always be reached (office back line, cell phone, etc.). When a caller asks to speak with a human or there's an emergency, the AI will transfer the call here. Must be different from your main number.
forwarding.humanLineDescConditional: A direct office number, cell phone, or back line for emergency transfers and human requests. If not provided, transfers go to your main clinic number.
forwarding.humanLineRequired: A dedicated human line is required when forwarding all calls. The AI needs a separate number to transfer callers to a real person.
forwarding.configSavedDesc: Your forwarding setup has been configured.
forwarding.humanLineInlineHint: A back line, cell phone, or any number staff can answer for emergency and human transfer requests.
forwarding.requiredNudge: Since all calls forward to AI, add a human line so the AI can transfer emergency and human requests.
forwarding.recommendedNudge: Add a human line so the AI can transfer emergency calls to a real person instead of your main line.
forwarding.nextStepsDesc: A Twilio forwarding number will be provisioned when you complete payment and deploy your AI receptionist in the review step.
forwarding.step1: We'll provision a Twilio number and share it with you
forwarding.step2Pre: Set up call forwarding on your carrier from
forwarding.step3: Calls will be handled by your AI receptionist.
forwarding.step3HumanLine: Emergency and human transfer requests will route to your dedicated human line.
forwarding.step3NoHumanLine: Human transfer requests will route to your main clinic number.
forwarding.carrierGuide: How to Set Up Forwarding on Your Carrier
forwarding.carrierGuideDesc: Use the codes below for your carrier. Choose All Calls for full AI coverage, or No-Answer / Busy if staff should answer first.

review.title: Review & Launch
review.description: Review your configuration and launch your AI receptionist
review.addPaymentMethod: Add your payment method to continue
review.reviewBeforeLaunch: Review your configuration before going live
review.configNotFound: Configuration not found. Please start from step 1.
review.voiceMissing: Voice configuration is missing. Please go back to step 1.

live.title: Your AI Receptionist is Live!
live.description: Your AI receptionist has been configured and is ready to answer calls

review.noVoice: No voice selected. Please go back to step 1.
review.noFiles: No files uploaded. You can add files later from settings.
review.noIntegrations: No integrations configured. You can add integrations later from settings.
review.readyToLaunchDesc: Your AI receptionist will be configured with a phone number automatically. You can update settings later from the dashboard.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Manage your account, branding, billing, and team

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Your personal account details. Authentication is managed through Cognito.
profile.passwordAndAuthDescription: Your password and MFA settings are managed through AWS Cognito

team.title: Team Members
team.description: Manage your team members and their access levels
team.noMembersDescription: Invite employees to collaborate on managing your AI receptionist
team.pendingInvitationsDescription: Invitations that haven't been accepted yet

branding.infoText: These settings will be used in all appointment confirmation emails sent to your patients. If not provided, default values will be used.
branding.title: Branding Settings
branding.description: Configure your clinic's branding for email communications
branding.logoRecommendation: Recommended: 200x50px PNG with transparent background. Must be publicly accessible URL.
branding.logoLoadError: Failed to load logo. Check the URL.
branding.colorUsage: Used for buttons and highlights in emails
branding.businessNameHint: Leave blank to use your account name in emails
branding.contactEmailHint: Email address patients can use to contact you
branding.contactPhoneHint: Phone number patients can call for changes or questions
branding.previewNote: Your branding will appear in appointment confirmation, cancellation, and reschedule emails sent to patients.

features.title: AI Receptionist
features.liveMessage: Your AI receptionist is live. {{count}} features enabled.
features.offMessage: Your AI receptionist is turned off. Enable it to start answering calls.
features.featureControlsDesc: Toggle individual features on or off. Changes take effect immediately.
features.infoNote: Core features are enabled by default. Toggle optional features based on your needs. Features marked "Coming Soon" are in development.

aiReceptionist.name: AI Receptionist
aiReceptionist.description: Your AI-powered phone receptionist answers calls, books appointments, and handles patient inquiries 24/7.

callLogging.name: Call Logging & Analytics
callLogging.description: Track all incoming calls, view transcripts, and monitor AI performance with detailed analytics.

knowledgeBase.name: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Upload documents to train your AI on your services, policies, and FAQs.

smsConfirmations.name: SMS Confirmations
smsConfirmations.description: Send SMS appointment confirmations and reminders to patients via Twilio.

emailConfirmations.name: Email Confirmations
emailConfirmations.description: Send branded email confirmations for appointments, cancellations, and reschedules.

outboundCalls.name: Outbound Calls
outboundCalls.description: Proactively reach out to patients for appointment reminders, follow-ups, and recall campaigns.

googleCalendar.name: Google Calendar
googleCalendar.description: Sync appointments with Google Calendar for real-time availability and booking.

pmsIntegration.name: PMS Integration
pmsIntegration.description: Connect your Practice Management System for seamless patient and appointment management.

insuranceVerification.name: Insurance Verification
insuranceVerification.description: Automatically verify patient insurance eligibility and benefits before appointments.

paymentCollection.name: Payment Collection
paymentCollection.description: Collect patient payments and co-pays over the phone or via SMS payment links.

leadManagement.name: Lead Management
leadManagement.description: Capture and manage new patient leads from calls, track conversion rates, and automate follow-ups.
